var type = node.attributes.tabId;

var ok = false;

if(type == "thing"){  
    var window = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow');
    window.setSelectThing(path);
}

@/@item/@Window/@items/@mainTabPanel/@items/@thingIndexTree/@listeners/@click
sname
click
sparams
node,e
suseChildsCode
false
Scode
#$@text#$@
var path = node.attributes.dataId;
var type = node.attributes.tabId;
var thingManager = null;
var ok = false;

var indexTree = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_thingIndexTree');
indexTree.currentNode = node;

var downButton = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_idxDownButton');
var upButton = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_idxUpButton');

if(type == "thingIndex"){
    downButton.setDisabled(false);
}else{
    downButton.setDisabled(true);
}

if(type == "thing" || type == "thingIndex"){
    var thing = path.substring(6, path.length);
    var window = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow');
    window.setSelectThing(thing);
}
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
suseChildExtThing
false
svarglobal
false
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Ext.tree.TreePanel/@listeners/@click
sinheritDescription
false
sth_createIndex
false
sth_registMyChilds
false
sth_mark
false
@/@item/@Window/@items/@mainTabPanel/@items/@thingIndexTree/@listeners/@dblclick
sname
dblclick
sparams
node,e
suseChildsCode
false
Scode
#$@text#$@
var path = node.attributes.dataId;
var type = node.attributes.tabId;
var thingManager = null;

var indexTree = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_thingIndexTree');
indexTree.currentNode = node;

var downButton = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_idxDownButton');
var upButton = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_idxUpButton');

if(type == "thingIndex"){    
    var rootNode = indexTree.getRootNode();
    var thing = path.substring(6, path.length);
    
    if(!indexTree.indexStack){
        indexTree.indexStack = new Array();
    }
    indexTree.indexStack.push(thing);
    
    rootNode.id = thing;
    rootNode.reload();
    
    downButton.setDisabled(true);
    upButton.setDisabled(false);
    
    var window = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow');
    window.setSelectThing(thing);
}else if(type == "thing"){
    var thing = path.substring(6, path.length);
    var window = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow');
    window.setSelectThing(thing);
}
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
suseChildExtThing
false
svarglobal
false
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Ext.tree.TreePanel/@listeners/@dblclick
sinheritDescription
false
sth_createIndex
false
sth_registMyChilds
false
sth_mark

indexTree.getRootNode().reload();

'xworker_SelectThingWindow_idxDownButton'

xworker.html.extjs.Items/@Button

sth_createIndex

sth_registMyChilds

sth_mark
false
@/@item/@Window/@items/@mainTabPanel/@items/@thingIndexTree/@tbar/@Toolbar/@items/@Button1/@handler
sname
handler
suseChildsCode
false
Scode
#$@text#$@
var downButton = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_idxDownButton');
var upButton = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_idxUpButton');

var indexTree = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_thingIndexTree');
if(indexTree.currentNode){
    var node = indexTree.currentNode;
    var path = node.attributes.dataId;
    var type = node.attributes.tabId;
    
    if(type == "thingIndex"){    
        var rootNode = indexTree.getRootNode();
        var thing = path.substring(6, path.length);
        
        if(!indexTree.indexStack){
            indexTree.indexStack = new Array();
        }
        indexTree.indexStack.push(thing);
        
        rootNode.id = thing;
        rootNode.reload();
        
        downButton.setDisabled(true);
        upButton.setDisabled(false);
        return;
    }
}
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode
false
suseChildExtThing
false
svarglobal
false
sdescriptors
xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Button/@24224
sinheritDescription
false
sth_createIndex
false
sth_registMyChilds
false
sth_mark
false

@/@item/@Window/@items/@mainTabPanel/@items/@thingIndexTree/@tbar/@Toolbar/@items/@upButton/@handler
sname
handler
suseChildsCode
false
Scode
#$@text#$@
var downButton = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_idxDownButton');
var upButton = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_idxUpButton');

var indexTree = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_thingIndexTree');
var  thing = indexTree.indexStack.pop();
var rootNode = indexTree.getRootNode();

rootNode.id = thing;
rootNode.reload();

downButton.setDisabled(true);    
if(indexTree.indexStack.length == 0){
    upButton.setDisabled(true);
}
#$@text#$@

#$@text#$@
var indexTree = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_thingIndexTree');
var rootNode = indexTree.getRootNode();
rootNode.id = 'xworker.lang.util.ThingIndex';
rootNode.reload();

sth_mark
false
@/@item/@Window/@buttons/@Button/@handler
sname
handler
suseChildsCode
false
Scode
#$@text#$@
//当前选择的事物
var form = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_formPanel').getForm();
var values = form.getValues();

//回调打开窗口时传入的函数
var window = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow');
if(window.parentFn){
    if(Ext.isFunction(window.parentFn)){
        window.parentFn(values.thing);
    }else{
        window.parentFn.setValue(values.thing);
    }
}

//关闭窗口
Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow').hide();
#$@text#$@
shaveTypeInCode

@/@item/@Window/@setSelectThing
sname
setSelectThing
sparams
thing
suseChildsCode
false
Scode
#$@text#$@
var okButton = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_okButton');
okButton.setDisabled(false);

var form = Ext.getCmp('xworker_SelectThingWindow_formPanel').getForm();
form.setValues({thing: thing});
#$@text#$@
